entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
